answerText: The Silver Tassie[10] This other play by Sean O'Casey, the author of The Silver Tassie, is about Captain Jack Boyle, a chronic drunk who wastes time with Joxer Daly at the behest of his wife.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 5 | 6 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this play, the Croucher incorrectly recites lines from Ezekiel while atop a tank near war trenches, and Dr. Maxwell treats Harry who has been paralyzed from the waist down. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which Harry Heegan's best friend Barney is caught having sex with Harry's girlfriend Jessie after Harry and Barney win a trophy for their football team.
